## WebMapMain.onLoad() method

helper method to wait for events to load. By default, card creation is tracked

**Signature:**

```typescript
onLoad(event?: keyof WebMapEvents): Promise<this>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | keyof [WebMapEvents](./webmap.webmapevents.md) | _(Optional)_ The name of the event whose status is checked |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;this&gt;

## Example


```javascript
var webMap = new WebMap(options);
webMap.onLoad().then(function () {
  webMap.getEventStatus('create'); // true
})

// use async/await syntax
async function () {
  await webMap.onLoad();
  doSomething();
}

```
